original: “bhante nāgasena, ‘samuddo samuddo’ti vuccati, kena kāraṇena udakaṁ ‘samuddo’ti vuccatī”ti?
analyzed: ▁bhante ▁nāgasena ▁ samudd o ▁ samudd oti ▁vuccati ▁kena ▁kāraṇena ▁udakaṃ ▁ samudd oti ▁vuccatīti
▁yat tak aṃ ▁mahārāja ▁udakaṃ ▁ta ttak aṃ ▁ lo ṇ aṃ
